Class RecognitionClient

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ru.yandex.speechkit.RecognizerListener

    public class RecognitionClient
extends RecognizerListenerAdapter
    Class that handles recognition events.

    • Method Detail

      • setRecognitionListener

        public void setRecognitionListener(RecognitionListener recognitionListener)

      • start

        public void start(boolean resumedAfterPlaying)
        Starts recognition.
        Parameters:
        resumedAfterPlaying - true if recognition was previously stopped to vocalize message, false otherwise. Used to notify UI.

      • stop

        public void stop(boolean willStartPlaying)
        Stops recognition.
        Parameters:
        willStartPlaying - true if message vocalization will be started, false otherwise. Used to notify UI.

      • reject

        public void reject(boolean shouldContinueRecognition)
        Rejects active Recognizers and calls RecognitionListener.onPhraseRecognized(long, String) if there is partial recognition result.
        Parameters:
        shouldContinueRecognition - true if recognition should be continued and method was called only to obtain current partial result, not vocalization. false otherwise.
